verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me again<WH559>, saying,

What mean you<WH4911>, that you use this proverb<WH4912> concerning the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, The fathers<WH1> have eaten<WH398> sour grapes<WH1155>, and the children<WH1121>'s teeth<WH8127> are set on edge<WH6949>?
As I live<WH2416>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>, you shall not have occasion any more to use<WH4911> this proverb<WH4912> in Israel<WH3478>.
Behold<WH5315>, all souls are mine<WH5315>; as the soul of the father<WH1>, so also the soul<WH5315> of the son<WH1121> is mine<WH5315>: the soul that sins<WH2398>, it shall die<WH4191>.
But if a man<WH376> be just<WH6662>, and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right<WH6666>,

And has not eaten<WH398> upon the mountains<WH2022>, neither has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, neither has defiled<WH2930> his neighbors<WH7453> wife<WH802>, neither has come near<WH7126> to a menstruous<WH5079> woman<WH802>,

Has walked<WH1980> in my statutes<WH2708>, and has kept<WH8104> my judgments<WH4941>, to deal<WH6213> truly<WH571>; he is just<WH6662>, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.
If he beget<WH3205> a son<WH1121> that is a robber<WH6530>, a shedder<WH8210> of blood<WH1818>, and that does<WH6213> the like<WH251> to any one of these things<WH259>,
And that does<WH6213> not any of those duties<WH398>, but even has eaten upon the mountains<WH2022>, and defiled<WH2930> his neighbors<WH7453> wife<WH802>,

Has oppressed<WH3238> the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34>, has spoiled<WH1497> by violence<WH1500>, has not restored<WH7725> the pledge<WH2258>, and has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols<WH1544>, has committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441>,

Has given forth<WH5414> upon usury<WH5392>, and has taken<WH3947> increase<WH8636>: shall he then live<WH2425>? he shall not live<WH2421>: he has done<WH6213> all these abominations<WH8441>; he shall surely<WH4191> die<WH4191>; his blood shall be upon him<WH1818>.
Now<WH3205>, behold, if he beget a son<WH1121>, that sees<WH7200> all his father<WH1>'s sins<WH2403> which he has done<WH6213>, and considers<WH7200>, and does<WH6213> not such like<WH2004>,

That has not eaten<WH398> upon the mountains<WH2022>, neither has lifted up<WH5375> his eyes<WH5869> to the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, has not defiled<WH2930> his neighbors<WH7453> wife<WH802>,

Neither has oppressed<WH3238> any<WH376>, has not withheld<WH2254> the pledge<WH2258>, neither has spoiled<WH1497> by violence<WH1500>, but has given<WH5414> his bread<WH3899> to the hungry<WH7457>, and has covered<WH3680> the naked<WH5903> with a garment<WH899>,

That has taken off<WH7725> his hand<WH3027> from the poor<WH6041>, that has not received<WH3947> usury<WH5392> nor increase<WH8636>, has executed<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, has walked<WH1980> in my statutes<WH2708>; he shall not die<WH4191> for the iniquity<WH5771> of his father<WH1>, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>.

As for his father<WH1>, because he cruelly<WH6233> oppressed<WH6231>, spoiled<WH1497> his brother<WH251> by violence<WH1499>, and did<WH6213> that which is not good<WH2896> among<WH8432> his people<WH5971>, behold<WH4191>, even he shall die in his iniquity<WH5771>.

Yet say<WH559> you<WH1121>, Why? does not the son bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father<WH1>? When the son<WH1121> has done<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right<WH6666>, and has kept<WH8104> all my statutes<WH2708>, and has done<WH6213> them<WH2421>, he shall surely live<WH2421>.

The soul<WH5315> that sins<WH2398>, it shall die<WH4191>. The son<WH1121> shall not bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the father<WH1>, neither shall the father<WH1> bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the son<WH1121>: the righteousness<WH6666> of the righteous<WH6662> shall be upon him<WH7564>, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be upon him<WH7563>.

But if the wicked<WH7563> will turn<WH7725> from all his sins<WH2403> that he has committed<WH6213>, and keep<WH8104> all my statutes<WH2708>, and do<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right<WH6666>, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>, he shall not die<WH4191>.
All his transgressions<WH6588> that he has committed<WH6213>, they shall not be mentioned<WH2142> unto him<WH6666>: in his righteousness that he has done<WH6213> he shall live<WH2421>.

Have I any pleasure<WH2654> at all<WH2654> that the wicked<WH7563> should die<WH4194>? says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>: and not that he should return<WH7725> from his ways<WH1870>, and live<WH2421>?

But when the righteous<WH6662> turns away<WH7725> from his righteousness<WH6666>, and commits<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>, and does<WH6213> according to all the abominations<WH8441> that the wicked<WH7563> man does<WH6213>, shall he live<WH2425>? All his righteousness<WH6666> that he has done<WH6213> shall not be mentioned<WH2142>: in his trespass<WH4603> that he has trespassed<WH4604>, and in his sin<WH2403> that he has sinned<WH2398>, in them shall he die<WH4191>.

Yet you say<WH559>, The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal<WH8505>. Hear<WH8085> now<WH1004>, O house of Israel<WH3478>; Is not my way<WH1870> equal<WH8505>? are not your ways<WH1870> unequal<WH8505>?

When a righteous<WH6662> man turns away<WH7725> from his righteousness<WH6666>, and commits<WH6213> iniquity<WH5766>, and dies<WH4191> in them<WH5766>; for his iniquity that he has done<WH6213> shall he die<WH4191>.

Again<WH7563>, when the wicked man turns away<WH7725> from his wickedness<WH7564> that he has committed<WH6213>, and does<WH6213> that which is lawful<WH4941> and right<WH6666>, he shall save<WH2421> his soul<WH5315> alive<WH2421>.
Because he considers<WH7200>, and turns away<WH7725> from all his transgressions<WH6588> that he has committed<WH6213>, he shall surely<WH2421> live<WH2421>, he shall not die<WH4191>.

Yet says<WH559> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, The way<WH1870> of the Lord<WH136> is not equal<WH8505>. O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, are not my ways<WH1870> equal<WH8505>? are not your ways<WH1870> unequal<WH8505>?

Therefore I will judge<WH8199> you<WH1004>, O house of Israel<WH3478>, every one<WH376> according to his ways<WH1870>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>. Repent<WH7725>, and turn<WH7725> yourselves from all your transgressions<WH6588>; so iniquity<WH5771> shall not be your ruin<WH4383>.

Cast away<WH7993> from you all your transgressions<WH6588>, by which you have transgressed<WH6586>; and make<WH6213> you a new<WH2319> heart<WH3820> and a new<WH2319> spirit<WH7307>: for why will you die<WH4191>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>?
For I have no pleasure<WH2654> in the death<WH4194> of him that dies<WH4191>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>: therefore turn<WH7725> yourselves<WH2421>, and live you.
